title: Eucalyptus Sap
summaries: The Eucalyptus Sap is a pet-summoning item that spawns a pet Sugar Glider to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, the Sugar Glider flies while extending its gliding membranes to catch up to them. The Eucalyptus Sap has a 1/1000 (0.1%) chance of dropping when the player shakes a tree.

statistics.Sell: 2 GC
